title: How to Draw Blue from Blue's Clues

steps.title: Start by drawing Blue’s head.
steps.content: Start by drawing Blue’s head. Draw a form shaped like a bell and sketch two circles under it.

steps.title: The next step is to draw vertical and horizontal line or guidelines for her head.
steps.content: The next step is to draw vertical and horizontal line or guidelines for her head.

steps.title: Then draw her ears by drawing two circles and connecting it on top of her sketched head.
steps.content: Then draw her ears by drawing two circles and connecting it on top of her sketched head. Don’t forget to connect it by sketching swayed lines to emphasize the movement of her ears.

steps.title: Now draw her body by drawing first a vertical guideline below her head.
steps.content: Now draw her body by drawing first a vertical guideline below her head.

steps.title: Following your guideline, draw her body by drawing a rounded triangle, two ovals below it plus a small elongated oval for her tail.
steps.content: Following your guideline, draw her body by drawing a rounded triangle, two ovals below it plus a small elongated oval for her tail. Make the rounded triangle almost to a circle but still retaining its triangular shape.

steps.title: Draw other details on Blue by adding her nose, small eyes, tongue, hands and toenails.
steps.content: Draw other details on Blue by adding her nose, small eyes, tongue, hands and toenails. Sketch her nose by copying the shape of a puzzle piece and her hand like a shape of a distorted Mickey Mouse head.

steps.title: Clean-up your drawing by erasing guidelines and inside lines.
steps.content: Clean-up your drawing by erasing guidelines and inside lines.

steps.title: You can now outline your drawing.
steps.content: You can now outline your drawing. Draw thick lines by using a black pen or marker.

steps.title: After outlining your drawing, add Blue’s spots as the last detail on your drawing.
steps.content: After outlining your drawing, add Blue’s spots as the last detail on your drawing. Don’t forget to outline the spots after you have sketched it on Blue.

steps.title: Color your drawing.
steps.content: Color your drawing. Use different variations of blue from light, medium to dark blue.
